# Existing Resources

Many existing resources exist on the topic of traffic microsimulation.
Some information may be old, but still has value.
Other information is cutting edge research, but applies to an academic-oriented audience.
The following is a list of resources that have been found useful time after time.

- [FHWA Traffic Analysis Toolbox](https://ops.fhwa.dot.gov/trafficanalysistools/index.htm), espcially [Volume III](https://ops.fhwa.dot.gov/trafficanalysistools/tat_vol3/vol3_guidelines.pdf)
